pull.title: test: don't override BITCOIND and BITCOINCLI if they're set
pull.body: In rpc-tests.py, don't override BITCOIND and BITCOINCLI if they're already set. Makes it possible to run the tests with either another tree or the GUI.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
test: don't override BITCOIND and BITCOINCLI if they're set

In rpc-tests.py, don't override BITCOIND and BITCOINCLI if they're
already set. Makes it possible to run the tests with either another tree
or the GUI.

issue.title: [RPC-Tests] add simple way to run rpc test over QT clients
issue.body:
Use env variable QT=1.
Example: `QT=1 ./qa/rpc-tests/wallet.py --srcdir=src/`

The RPC test will be executed over GUI clients.
It pretty cool to visually watch the RPC test slowly gets executed.
Much slower then `bitcoind`; aims to help testing and improving UI situations.

issue.title: qa: Set correct path for binaries in rpc tests
issue.body: Probably copy paste error introduced in  #9657.
